name: Glabrezu
description: A towering creature with the body of a beast and four arms, two with massive pincers and two clawed hands. It embodies both brute strength and cunning.
memorable: Its ability to cast Wish and manipulate others through deception makes the Glabrezu a terrifying and unpredictable foe.
goals: To corrupt mortals, manipulate them into making deals, and serve as a general in the chaotic armies of the Abyss.
relations: Often serves higher-ranking demon lords and commands lesser demons.
environment: Commonly found in the chaotic realms of the Abyss, amidst twisted landscapes and nightmarish caverns.
strengths: High physical strength and magical resilience, granting it advantage against spells and effects.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to radiant damage and limited effectiveness against certain magic types.
attacks: Uses multiattack with massive pincers that can grapple foes and brutal fists to deal substantial damage.
most_powerful_ability: Wish, allowing it to alter reality with significant demands from the target.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, enabling it to see through illusions.
skills: Skilled in Deception (+8) and Stealth (+7), making it a master manipulator in and out of combat.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and poisoned condition.
Resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
Magic Resistance increases its survivability against spellcasters.
Can create magical darkness to obscure combat.
Utilizes confusion to sow chaos among enemies.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with access to spells like darkness and confusion, enhancing its strategic capabilities.
test_queries: fiend with pincers and magical darkness
powerful demon that offers corrupt deals
demonic creature with truesight and wish ability
